title: Datenauswertung
text:
Trainingsdatensatz

d_train <- read_tsv("C:/Users/sapi-/OneDrive/Studium/5. Semester/Data Science II/Data_Science_Blog/posts/Text-Mining/germeval2018.training.txt", col_names = FALSE)

Rows: 5009 Columns: 3
-- Column specification --------------------------------------------------------
Delimiter: "\t"
chr (3): X1, X2, X3

i Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
i Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.



Spalten umbenennen

names(d_train) <- c("text", "c1", "c2")



ID-Spalte einfügen

d_train <- d_train %>% 
  mutate(id = row_number()) %>% 
  select(id, everything())

title: Datenauswertung

  mutate(id = row_number()) %>% 
  select(id, everything())
